arStrings.szText: Each percent of your Maximum Life you Heal beyond {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} grants you {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1" * 100|1%x|]{/c} bonus Critical Strike Damage on your next Critical Strike, up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} bonus.

Each percent of your Maximum Life you Heal beyond {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} grants you {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1" * 100|1%x|]{/c} bonus Critical Strike Damage on your next Critical Strike.
